subject: Public Speaking
title: Reagan: The Great Communicator
description: A fast breakdown of Reagan: The Great Communicator for builders.

hook.text: Reagan told stories instead of policies. That's why he communicated.

buildup.text: He humanized abstract political issues through anecdotes.

discovery.text: Reagan proved narrative beats statistics in political persuasion.

twist.text: Critics attacked his ideas but couldn't deny his communication.

climax.text: Storytelling is the ultimate political tool.

punchline.text: Tell stories, not statistics. They remember.

quiz.question: What was Reagan's strength?
options: Stories that made abstract ideas emotional
